metadata.title: CVE-2022-1205 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: [Null pointer dereference and use-after-free in net/ax25/ax25_timer.c] Duoming Zhou discovered race conditions in the AX.25 amateur radio protocol implementation in the Linux kernel, leading to use-after-free vulnerabilities. A local attacker could possibly use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).
